titles.title: To To require health insurance coverage for the treatment of infertility.
To To require health insurance coverage for the treatment of infertility.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Reform, Armed Services, and Veterans' Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
